title: Copper Penny (Copperplate Gothic Revisited)...
content:
This didn't go over very well the first time I posted it. But, my clan's motto is "Gang Forward" which I think means we're too stupid to give up. So here we are again.

Copper Penny is a revisitation of Copperplate Gothic. It features some new character forms and a complete lower case set.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110221im_/http:/typophile.com/files/CopperPennyPoster500_3837.jpg)

Available from MyFonts.com...  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/copper-penny/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110221/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/copper-penny/)

Specimen Document...  
 [http://cdn.myfonts.com/s/aw/original/40/0/20617.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013110221/http:/cdn.myfonts.com/s/aw/original/40/0/20617.pdf)
author: phrostbyte64

comments.content: I like it! Best of luck with sales on Myfonts!
You’ve taken a face that normally bores me to tears and make it feel fresh and interesting. The special version for signmakers is especially interesting. Great work!
